fields.name: Service_Territory
fields.fieldText: Service Resource, Territory & Work Type Details

fields.name: ServiceResMessage
fields.fieldText:
To Change the Service Resource, Service Territory & Work Type Information click on the button to the right.


Note:


  1. First Click on Update Territory Details button
  2. Change the Details
  3. If Service Territory Location is Changed
  4. Then, Click the Update Service Territory Members button
